kihkcvfdText: MADRS PDQ DSST SDS UPSA SHAPS EEfRT ODQ GAS-DMEI
kihkcvfeText: MEI - Motivation and Energy Inventory1
kihkcvffText: MEI is a 27-item scale, assessing fatigue and lassitude
kihkcvfgText:
Originally developed for evaluating interventions to improve motivation and
energy in patients with depression
kihkcvfiText: During the past 7 days, how often did you feel enthusiastic when you began your day?
kihkcvfjText: During the past 7 days, how often did you have trouble making minor decisions?
kihkcvfkText:
Responses are scored on a 5 or 7 point Likert scale, higher scores indicate
higher level of motivation & energy.
kihkcvfoText: Physical energySocial motivation
